title: Arnaud Maire
text:
Arnaud Maire (born March 6, 1979) is a French <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender.
Career.
Maire began his professional football career with <a href="Besan%C3%A7on%20RC">Besançon RC</a>. He joined <a href="AC%20Ajaccio">AC Ajaccio</a> late in his career helping the Corsican club gain promotion to <a href="Ligue%201">Ligue 1</a> during the 2010–11 season, but he spent most of his spell in Ligue 1 on the substitute's bench.
